entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
